name: Monster Fear: Incredible Stunt
description:
Monster Fear: Incredible Stunts Tracks is racing stunts based racing game . In this game you can improve your racing skills against your opponents and choose your superheroes to race against your opponents , opponents are strong , they have strong racing skills . you have to train your virtual superhero family according to race club in this extreme bike uphill racing game .
Features:
- Smooth Controls
- Amazing Environments
- Fantastic Graphics
- Strategy Game Levels
- Selection Of Player Monster Trucks
- Selection Of Environments
